meanings.definition: Excessive or too much physical or mental activity.
meanings.sent1: The children were exhausted after their overactivities day at the park.
meanings.sent2: She felt overwhelmed by her overactivities schedule.
meanings.sent3: His overactivities enthusiasm for the project was contagious.
meanings.sent4: The city buzzed with the overactivities of its busy inhabitants.
meanings.sent5: The overactivities pace of life in the city never seemed to slow down.

meanings.definition: The state of being overly active or busy.
meanings.sent1: Her overactivities kept her from taking a moment to relax.
meanings.sent2: The office was in chaos due to the overactivities of the employees.
meanings.sent3: The overactivities of the squirrel gathering nuts entertained the onlookers.
meanings.sent4: The overactivities of the market reflected a thriving economy.
meanings.sent5: The overactivities of the bees in the garden were a sign of a healthy ecosystem.
